reviewText: Great movies looked great on the television

The 3 stars are for THIS PRODUCT AS IT IS PACKAGED and is NOT a rating of the movies themselves or a rating on the quality of the video and audio of the disks.  While all 3 of these films are fantastic (I was completely blown away by American Gangster and Eastern Promises), do yourself a favor, save 16 bucks and buy the Blu-Ray versions of these separately.
I strongly recommend all of these films, Casino of course being one of the greatest films ever, and the other two definitely worth owning.  The transfer on Eastern Promises is fantastic!
